
#+CAPTION: and _multiple_
#+CAPTION: lines of *captions*!
#+ATTR_HTML: :class "a b c"
#+ATTR_HTML: :id it
#+BEGIN_SRC sh
echo "a bash source block with custom html attributes"
#+END_SRC
